name: Tandem Evasion
text: You and your allies help each other evade deadly attacks.
benefit: When adjacent to an ally who also has this feat, you gain evasion against a dragon’s breath weapon and tail sweep special attacks. If you already have evasion, you gain improved evasion instead.
staminaText: You can spend 5 stamina points to benefit from this feat even if there are no adjacent allies who also have this feat. However, if you fail your save, you are knocked prone. (Dragonslayer’s Handbook 21)
text_zh: 你和你的盟友相互帮助以躲避致命的攻击。
benefit_zh: 当临近的一个盟友也拥有此专长时，你获得对龙的喷吐武器和尾扫特殊攻击的反射闪避。如果你已经用有反射闪避，你改为获得精通反射闪避。
staminaText_zh: 即使你邻接的盟友并没有这个专长，你也可以消耗5点耐力来获得这个专长的效果。但如果你的豁免失败，你会被击倒。
